Speaker: Grandpa
Line: Peter, your mama wants to speak with you. Come on, Pete. Take these fool things off.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: Why have you been fighting with the other boys again, baby. Peter.

Speaker: Young Quill
Line: They killed a little frog that ain’t done nothin’. Smushed it with a stick.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: You’re so like your daddy. You even look like him. And he was an angel. Composed of pure light

Speaker: Grandpa Mer
Line: You got a present there for Peter, don’t you.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: Of course.

Speaker: Grandpa
Line: There. I’ve got you covered, Pete.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: You open it up when I’m gone, okay. Your grandpa is gonna take such good care of you. At least until your daddy comes back to get you. Take my hand. Peter.

Speaker: Grandpa
Line: Pete, come on.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: Take my hand.

Speaker: Young Quill
Line: Mom. No. No. No. No. Mom. No.

Speaker: Grandpa
Line: Come with me.

Speaker: Young Quill
Line: No. No.

Speaker: Grandpa
Line: You’ve got to stay here. Please.

Speaker: Young Quill
Line: No…

Speaker: Grandpa
Line: Okay.

Speaker: Young Quill
Line: No. Mom.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Drop it.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Uh… hey.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Drop it, now.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey, cool, man. No problem. No problem at all.

Speaker: Korath
Line: How do you know about this.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: I don’t even know what that is. I’m just a junker, man. I was just.just checking stuff out.

Speaker: Korath
Line: You don’t look like a junker. You’re wearing Ravager garb.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: This is just an outfit, man. Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me.

Speaker: Korath
Line: What is your name.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: My name is Peter Quill, okay. Dude, chill out.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Move.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Why.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Ronan may have questions for you.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey, you know what. There’s another name you might know me by. Star-Lord.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Who.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Star-Lord, man. Legendary outlaw. Guys.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Move.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Ah, forget this.

Speaker: Bereet
Line: Peter. What happened.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey, uh…uh. I…

Speaker: Bereet
Line: Bereet.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Bereet. Look, I’m gonna be totally honest with you. I forgot you were here.

Speaker: News Reporter
Line: Scattered riots broke out across the Kree Empire today protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor and Xandar’s Nova Prime.

Speaker: Bereet
Line: Peter, you have call.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: No, wait, don’t.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Quill.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey, Yondu.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: I’m here on Morag. Ain’t no Orb, ain’t no you.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Well, I was in the neighborhood. I thought I’d save you the hassle.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Well, where are you at now, boy.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: I feel really bad about this, but I’m not gonna tell you that.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: I slaved putting this deal together…

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Slaved. Making a few calls is slaved.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: And now you’re gonna rip me off.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: I mean, really.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: We do not do that to each other. We’re Ravagers. We got a code.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah, and that code is steal from everybody.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: When I picked you up on Terra…

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Picked me up.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: …these boys of mine wanted to eat you.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: They ain’t never tasted any Terran before. I stopped ‘em. You’re alive because of me. I will find you, I will… Put a bounty on him. Forty K. But I want him back alive.

Speaker: Kraglin
Line: Yeah, Cap.

Speaker: Horuz
Line: Alive.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: That’s what I said.

Speaker: Horuz
Line: I told you when you picked that kid up, you should have delivered him like we was hired to do. He was cargo. You have always been soft on him.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: You’re the only one I’m being soft on. Now, don’t you worry about Mr Quill. As soon as we get him back here, I’m gonna kill him myself. What we do need to worry about, is who else out there wants that orb.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: They call me terrorist, radical, zealot, because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree, and punish those who do not. Because I do not forgive your people for taking the life of my father, and his father, and his father before him. A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten.

Speaker: Xandarian Prisoner
Line: You can’t do this. Our government signed a peace treaty.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: My government knows no shame. You Xandarians and your culture are a disease.

Speaker: Xandarian Prisoner
Line: You will never rule Xandar.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: No. I will cure it.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Ronan, Korath has returned.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Master, he is a thief, an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord. But we have discovered he has an agreement to retrieve the orb for an intermediary known as The Broker.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: I promised Thanos I would retrieve the orb for him. Only then will he destroy Xandar for me. Nebula, go to Xandar and get me the orb.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: It will be my honor.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: It will be your doom. If this happens again, you’ll be facing our father without his prize.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: I’m a daughter of Thanos. Just like you.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: But I know Xandar.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Ronan has already decreed that I…

Speaker: Ronan
Line: Do not speak for me. You will not fail.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Have I ever.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Xandarians. What a bunch of losers. All of them in a big hurry to get from something stupid, to nothing at all. Pathetic. Look at this guy. Can you believe they call us criminals, when he’s assaulting us with that haircut. What is this thing. Look how it thinks it’s so cool. It’s not cool to get help. Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle. chatting up a pretty young woman] Look at Mr Smiles over here. Where’s your wife, old man. What a class-A prevert. Right, Groot. Groot. Don’t drink fountain water, you idiot. That’s disgusting.

Speaker: Groot
Line: Mmm.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it. Why are you lying. Whoop. Looks like we got one. Okay, humie, how bad does someone wanna find you. Forty thousand units. Groot, we’re gonna be rich.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: Mr Quill

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Broker. The orb. As commissioned.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: Where’s Yondu.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Wanted to be here, sends his love. And told me to tell you, that you got the best eyebrows in the business. What is it.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: It’s my policy never to discuss my clients, or their needs.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah, well, I almost died getting it for you.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: An occupational hazard, I’m sure, in your line of work.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Some machine-headed freak, working for a dude named Ronan.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: Ronan. I’m sorry, Mr Quill. I truly am. But I want no part of this transaction if Ronan is involved.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Woh. Woh, woh, woh. Who’s Ronan.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty, who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture, is wiped from existence.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Woh. Come on.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: He’s someone whose bad side I’d rather not be on.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: What. What about my bad side.

Speaker: The Broker
Line: Farewell, Mr Quill.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey, we had a deal, bro.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: What happened.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Uh.this guy just backed out of a deal on me. If theres one thing I hate, its a man without integrity. Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: You have the bearing of a man of honor.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Well, you know, I wouldnt say that. People say it about me, all the time, but its not something I would ever say about myself.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: This wasnt the plan.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Put him in the bag. Put him in the bag.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: No. Not her, him. Learn genders, man. Biting. Thats not fair. Take it easy.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Fool. You should have learned.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: I dont learn. One of my issues. What the.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Quit smiling, you idiot. Youre supposed to be a professional. You gotta be kidding me. Hey. I live for the simple things. Like how much this is gonna hurt. Yeah. Writhe, little man. Itll grow back, you Dast idiot. Quit whining.

Speaker: Nova Arresting Pilot
Line: Subject 89P13, drop your weapon.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Oh, crap.

Speaker: Nova Arresting Pilot
Line: By the authority of the Nova Corps, you are under arrest.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Alright. Come on up.

Speaker: Nova Arresting Pilot
Line: .for endangerment to life and the destruction of property.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Hey. If it isnt Star-Prince.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Star-Lord.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Oh, sorry. Lord. I picked this guy up a while back for petty theft. Hes got a code name.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Come on, man. Its a.its an outlaw name.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Just relax, pal. Its cool to have a code name. Its not that weird.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Fascists.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Ronan is destroying Xandarian outposts throughout the galaxy. I should think that would call for some slight response on the part of the Kree.

Speaker: Kree Ambassador
Line: We signed your peace treaty, Nova Prime. What more do you want.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: At least a statement from the Kree Empire saying that they condemn his actions. He is slaughtering children, families.

Speaker: Kree Ambassador
Line: That is your business. Now, I have other matters to attend to.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Prick.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: Well, some good news. Looks like we’ve apprehended one of Ronan’s compatriots.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Gamora. Surgically modified and trained as a living weapon. The adopted daughter of the Mad Titan, Thanos. Recently, Thanos lent her and her sister Nebula out to Ronan, which leads us to believe that Thanos and Ronan are working together.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Subject 89P13. Calls itself Rocket. The result of illegal genetic and cybernetic experiments on a lower life form.

Speaker: Denarian Saal *referring to Groot*
Line: What the hell.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: They call it Groot. A humanoid plant that’s been traveling recently as 89P13’s personal house plant slash muscle.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Peter Jason Quill, from Terra. Raised from youth by a band of mercenaries called the Ravagers, led by Yondu Udonta.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Oh, I’m sorry. I didn’t know how this machine worked.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: What a bunch of a-holes. Transport all four to the Kyln.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: I guess most of Nova Corps wanna uphold the laws, but these ones here, theyre corrupt and cruel. But, hey, thats not my problem. I aint gonna be here long. Ive escaped 22 prisons, this ones no different. Youre lucky the broad showed up, because otherwise, me and Groot would be collecting that bounty right now, and youd be getting drawn and quartered by Yondu and those Ravagers.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Ive had a lot of folks try to kill me over the years. I aint about to be brought down by a tree and a talking raccoon.

Speaker: Prison Guard
Line: Hold.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Whats a raccoon.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Whats a raccoon. Its what you are, stupid.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Aint no thing like me, cept me.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: So, this orb has a real shiny blue suitcase, Ark of the Covenant, Maltese Falcon sort of vibe. What is it.

Speaker: Groot
Line: I am Groot.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: So what. Whats the Orb.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: I have no words for an honorless thief.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Pretty high and mighty coming from the lackey of a genocidal maniac. Yeah, I know who you are. Anyone whos anyone knows who you are.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah, we know who you are. Who is she. Yeah, you said that.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: I wasnt retrieving the orb for Ronan, I was betraying him. I had an agreement to sell it to a third party.

Speaker: Groot
Line: I am Groot.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Well, that’s just as fascinating as the first 89 times you told that. What is wrong with Giving Tree, here.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Well, he don’t know talking good like me and you. So his vocabulistics is limited to “I” and “am” and “Groot”. Exclusively in that order.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: I tell you what, that’s gonna wear real thin, real fast.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey. Put that away. Hey.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Listen to me you big blue bastard, take those headphones off, thats mine. Those belong to impound, that tape and that player is mine.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hooked on a Feeling, Blue Swede, 1973, that song belongs to me.

Speaker: Prisoner 1
Line: - Murderer.

Speaker: Prisoner 2
Line: Coming for you first, Gamora.

Speaker: Prisoner 3
Line: Youre dead.

Speaker: Prisoner 4
Line: Youre scum. Youre scum.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Its like I said, shes got a rep. A lot of prisoners here have lost their families to Ronan and his goons. Shell last a day, tops.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: Murderer.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: The guards will protect her, right.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Theyre here to stop us from getting out. They dont care what we do to each other inside.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Whatever nightmares the future holds, are dreams compared to whats behind me.

Speaker: Prisoner 6
Line: Check out the new meat. Im gonna slather you up in Gunavian jelly, and go to town.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Lets make something clear. This one here is our booty. You wanna get to him, you go through us. Or, more accurately, we go through you.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Im with them.

Speaker: Prisoner 7
Line: I hate you.

Speaker: Prisoner 8
Line: No cells gonna protect you for long.

Speaker: Prisoner 9
Line: Youre dead. Dead.

Speaker: Prisoner 10
Line: Take her down to the showers. Itll be easier to clean up the blood down there.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Quill, where you going. Quill. Quill.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: Gamora, consider this a death sentence for your crimes against the galaxy.

Speaker: Drax
Line: You dare. You know who I am, yes.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: Youre Drax. The Destroyer.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Quill.

Speaker: Drax
Line: And you know why they call me this.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: You slayed dozens of Ronans minions.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Ronan murdered my wife, Ovette, and my daughter, Camaria. He slaughtered them where they stood. And he laughed.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Quill.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Her life is not yours to take. He killed my family. I shall kill one of his in return.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: Of course, Drax. Here, I.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Quill. What are you doing.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Im no family to Ronan or Thanos. Im your only hope at stopping him.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Woman, your words mean nothing to me.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey. Hey, hey, hey. Hey.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Crap.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: You know, if killing Ronan is truly your sole purpose, I dont think this is the best way to go about it.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Are you not the man this wench attempted to kill.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Well, I mean, shes hardly the first woman to try and do that to me. Look, this is from a smoking-hot Rajak girl. Stabbed me with a fork. Didnt like me skipping out on her at sunrise. I got, right here, a Kree girl tried to rip out my thorax. She caught me with this skinny little Aaskavariian who worked in Nova Records. I was trying to get information. You ever see an Aaskavariian. They have tentacles, and needles for teeth. If you think Im seriously interested in that, then. You dont care. But heres the point. She betrayed Ronan. Hes coming back for her. And when he does, thats when you.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Why would I put my finger on his throat.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: What. No, its a symbol. This is a symbol for you slicing his throat.

Speaker: Drax
Line: I would not slice his throat. I would cut his head clean off.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Its a general expression for you killing somebody. Youve heard of this. Youve seen this, right. You know what that is.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: Yeah. Yeah.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Everyone knows.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: No, no.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: What Im saying is, you want to keep her alive. Dont do his work for him.

Speaker: Drax
Line: I like your knife. Im keeping it.

Speaker: Prisoner 5
Line: That was my favorite knife.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Listen. I could care less whether you live or whether you die.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Then why stop the big guy.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Simple. You know where to sell my Orb.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: How are we gonna sell it when we and it are still here.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: My friend Rocket, here, has escaped 22 prisons.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Oh, were getting out. And then were headed straight to Yondu to retrieve your bounty.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: How much was your buyer willing to pay you for my Orb.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Four billion units.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: What.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Holy shit.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: That Orb is my opportunity to get away from Thanos and Ronan. If you free us, Ill lead you to the buyer directly and Ill split the profit between the three of us.

Speaker: Groot
Line: I am Groot.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Four of us. Asleep for the danger, awake for the money, as per frickin usual.

Speaker: The Other
Line: You have been betrayed, Ronan.

Speaker: Ronan the Accuser
Line: We know only that she has been captured. Gamora may yet recover the Orb.

Speaker: The Other
Line: No. Our sources within the Kyln say Gamora has her own plans for the Orb. Your partnership with Thanos is at risk.

Speaker: The Other
Line: Thanos requires your presence. NOW.

Speaker: Ronan the Accuser
Line: With all due respect, Thanos, your daughter made this mess, and yet you summon me.

Speaker: The Other
Line: I would lower my voice, Accuser.

Speaker: Ronan the Accuser
Line: First, she lost a battle with some primitive.

Speaker: The Other
Line: Thanos put Gamora under your charge.

Speaker: Ronan the Accuser
Line: Then she was apprehended by the Nova Corps.

Speaker: The Other
Line: You are the one here with nothing to show for it.

Speaker: Ronan the Accuser
Line: Your sources say that she meant to betray us the whole time.

Speaker: The Other
Line: LOWER YOUR TONE. I MAY BE YOUR-

Speaker: Ronan the Accuser
Line: I only ask that you take this matter seriously.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: The only matter I did not take seriously, boy.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: .is you.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: Your politics bore me.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: Your demeanor is that of a pouty child.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: And, apparently.you alienated my favorite daughter, Gamora.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: I shall honor our agreement, Kree.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: If you bring me the Orb.

Speaker: Thanos *off-screen*
Line: But return to me again empty-handed.

Speaker: Thanos
Line: .and I will bathe the starways in your blood.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Thanks, dad.sounds fair.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: This is one fight you wont win.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Lets head to the Klyn.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: If were gonna get out of here, were gonna need to get into that watchtower. And to do that, Im gonna need a few things. The guards wear security bands to control their ins and outs. I need one.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Leave it to me.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: That dude, there. I need his prosthetic leg.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: His leg.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Yeah. God knows I dont need the rest of him. Look at him, hes useless.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: All right.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: And finally, on the wall back there is a black panel. Blinky yellow light. Do you see it.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Theres a quarnyx battery behind it. Purplish box, green wires. To get into that watchtower, I definitely need it.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: How are we supposed to do that.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Well, supposably, these bald-bodies find you attractive. So, maybe you can work out some sort of trade.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: You must be joking.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: No, I really heard they find you attractive.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Look, its 20 feet up in the air, and its in the middle of the most heavily-guarded part of the prison. Its impossible to get up there without being seen.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: I got one plan, and that plan requires a frickin quarnyx battery, so figure it out. Can I get back to it. Thanks. Now, this is important. Once the battery is removed, everything is gonna slam into emergency mode. Once we have it, we gotta move quickly, so you definitely need to get that last. Or we could just get it first and improvise.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Ill get the armband.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Leg.

Speaker: Guard 1
Line: Prisoner, drop the device immediately and retreat to your cell, or we will open fire.

Speaker: Groot
Line: I am Groot.

Speaker: Guard 1
Line: Fire.

Speaker: Guard 1
Line: All prisoners return to your sleeping areas.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: You idiot. How am I supposed to fight these things without my stuff.

Speaker: Guard 2
Line: The animal is in control. Fire on my command.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Creepy little beast.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Oh, yeah.

Speaker: Man
Line: You need my what.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Ill need this.

Speaker: Guard 3
Line: Good luck. Its internally wired.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Ill figure something out.

Speaker: Guard 4
Line: Drop the leg. Drop the leg and move back to your cell.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Rocket.

Speaker: Rocket, to Groot
Line: Move to the watchtower.

Speaker: Drax
Line: You. Man who has lain with an Aaskavariian.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: It was one time, man.

Speaker: Guard 1
Line: We need all available guards in full combat gear.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Spare me your foul gaze, woman.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Why is this one here.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: We promised him he could stay by your side until he kills your boss. I always keep my promises, when theyre to muscle-bound whack-jobs who will kill me if I dont. Here you go.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Oh, I was just kidding about the leg. I just need these two things.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: What.

Speaker: Rocket, while giggling
Line: No, I thought itd be funny. Was it funny. Wait, what did he look like hopping around.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: I had to transfer him 30,000 units.

Speaker: Drax
Line: How are we going to leave.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Well, hes got a plan. Right. Or is that another thing you made up.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: I have a plan. I have a plan.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Cease your yammering and relieve us from this irksome confinement.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah, Ill have to agree with the walking thesaurus on that one.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Do not ever call me a thesaurus.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Its just a metaphor, dude.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: His people are completely literal, metaphors are gonna go over his head.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Nothing goes over my head. My reflexes are too fast. I would catch it.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Im gonna die surrounded by the biggest idiots in the galaxy.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Those are some big guns.

Speaker: Head Riot Guard
Line: On my command. Number one.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Rodent, we are ready for your plan.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Hold on.

Speaker: Head Riot Guard
Line: Number two.

Speaker: Drax
Line: I recognize this animal. Wed roast them over a flame pit as children. Their flesh was quite delicious.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Not helping.

Speaker: Head Riot Guard
Line: Number three. All fire on my command. Three. Two. One.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: You turned off the artificial gravity, everywhere but in here.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: I told you I had a plan.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: That was a pretty good plan. Yeah. There it is. Get my ship. Its the Milano, the orange and blue one over in the corner.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: They crumpled my pants up into a ball. Thats rude. They folded yours.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: The orbs there. Lets go.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Wait, wait, wait.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: What.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: That bastard didnt put it back.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Put what back.

Line: Once Ronan is dead, we will retrieve the stone. Use these devices to contain it. If you touch it, it will kill you.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Ill contact one of the Nova officers who arrested us. Hopefully, theyll believe were there to help.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Theres one more thing we need to complete the plan. That guys eye.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: No. No, we dont. No, we dont need that guys eye.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: No, seriously, I need it. Its important to me.

Speaker: Ravager Navigator
Line: Ronans fleet has been spotted, and will arrive in t-minus fifteen minutes.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Remember, boy. At the end of all this, I get the stone. You cross me, we kill you all. Lets go get em, boys.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: This is a terrible plan.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hey, youre the one who said you wanted to die among friends.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Nova Prime. I received a transmission from one of the Ravagers. He says Ronans in possession of something called an Infinity Stone and hes headed toward Xandar.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Good God.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: Its a trick. Hes a criminal.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Did he say why we should believe him.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: He said his crew just escaped from prison so hed have no other reason to risk coming to Xandar to help. He says that hes an a-hole. But hes not, and Im quoting him here, one hundred percent a dick.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Do you believe him.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Well, I dont know that I believe anyones one hundred percent a dick, maam.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: I mean, do you believe that hes here to help.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Yeah.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: A fleet approaches, they appear to be Ravagers.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Fire. Cover it down. Submerge.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Rocket, hurry.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: All pilots, dive. Theyre beneath us.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Evacuate the city. Our priority is to get our people away from the battle.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Forward thrust, now.

Speaker: Kraglin
Line: Come on.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Quill. Yondu. Now.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Aw, hell. Im going down, Quill. No more games with me, boy. Ill see you at the end of this.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: There are too many of them, Rocket. Well never make it up there.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: Peter Quill, this is Denarian Saal of the Nova Corps. For the record, I advised against trusting you here.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: They got my dick message.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: Prove me wrong.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Yes. Yes.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Were just like Kevin Bacon.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: The starboard kern has been breached. We have been boarded.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: Continue our approach.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: But the Nova Corps have engaged.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: None of that will matter once we reach the surface.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Seal security doors. Now. Get out of my way.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Oh, man.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: All Nova pilots, interlock and form a blockade. The Dark Aster must not reach the ground.

Speaker: Nova Pilot #1
Line: Locked in.

Speaker: Nova Pilot #2
Line: Locked in. Were locked in.

Speaker: Drax
Line: I can barely see. When did you learn to do that.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Im pretty sure the answer is I am Groot.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: The flight deck is three hundred meters this way.

Speaker: Drax
Line: I want you all to know that I am grateful for your acceptance after my blunders. It is pleasing to once again have friends. You, Quill, are my friend.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Thanks.

Speaker: Drax
Line: This dumb tree, he is my friend.

Speaker: Groot
Line: Mmm.

Speaker: Drax
Line: And this green whore, she, too.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Oh, you must stop.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Gamora, look at what you have done. You have always been weak. You stupid, traitorous.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Nobody talks to my friends like that.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Head to the flight deck. Ill shut down the power to the security doors.

Speaker: Maskless Sakaaran
Line: Yondu Udonta. Order your men to turn on the Nova Corps. Enough nonsense, Ravager. Time to die.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Nebula, please.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: Enough of this. Necrocraft pilots, enact immolation initiative.

Speaker: Nova Pilot
Line: Theyre dive-bombing the city. Denarian Saal, should we break formation.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: No. Hold your positions.

Speaker: Rocket'
Line: Keep Ronan up there, Saal. Well take care of the people down here.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: I cant believe Im taking orders from a hamster.

Speaker: Korath
Line: Star-Lord.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Finally. You thief.

Speaker: Korath
Line: You will never make it to Ronan.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Everybody shoot them before they hit the ground.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Come on.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Finger to the throat means death. Metaphor.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah, sorta. Oh, no.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: Xandar, you stand accused. Your wretched peace treaty will not save you now. It is the tinder on which you burn.

Speaker: Denarian Saal
Line: Rocket.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Hold on, Saal, just. Quill, you gotta hurry. The citys been evacuated, but were getting our asses kicked down here.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Gamora hasnt opened the door.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Nebula. Sister, help us fight Ronan. You know hes crazy.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: I know youre both crazy.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: No.

Speaker: Ravager Pilot
Line: What the.

Speaker: Nebula
Line: Get out.

Speaker: Drax
Line: You did it.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: I was mistaken, I do remember your family. Their screams were pitiful. I.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: No, Groot. You cant, youll die. Why are you doing this. Why.

Speaker: Groot
Line: We are Groot.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: I called him an idiot.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: YOU KILLED GROOT.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: Behold. Your Guardians of the Galaxy. What fruit have they wrought. Only that my father and his father shall finally know vengeance. People of Xandar, the time has come to rejoice and renounce your paltry gods. Your salvation is at hand.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Ooh-oo child, things are gonna get easier. Ooh-oo child, thingsll get brighter. Listen to these words. Ooh-oo child, things are gonna get easier. Ooh-oo child, thingsll get brighter. Now bring it down hard. Some day, well get it together and well get it.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: What are you doing.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Dance-off, bro. Me and you. Gamora. Subtle. Take it back.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: What are you doing.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Im distracting you, you big turd blossom.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: PETER.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: TAKE MY HAND.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: Take my hand, Peter.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Mom.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: TAKE MY HAND.

Speaker: Ronan
Line: YOURE MORTAL. HOW.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: You said it yourself, bitch. Were the Guardians of the Galaxy.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Well, well, well. Quite the light show. Aint this sweet. But you got some business to attend to before all the nookie-nookie starts.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Peter, you cant. Peter.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: You gotta reconsider this, Yondu. I dont know who youre selling this to, but the only way the universe can survive is if you give it to the Nova Corps.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: I may be as pretty as an angel, but I sure as hell aint one. Hand it over, son.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yondu. Do not open that orb. You know that, right. Youve seen what it does to people.

Speaker: Kraglin
Line: Yeah, Quill turned out okay. Its probably good we didnt deliver him to his dad like we was hired to do.

Speaker: Yondu Udonta
Line: Yeah, that guy was a jackass.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Hes gonna be so pissed when he realizes I switched out the orb on him.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: He was gonna kill you, Peter.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Oh, I know. But he was about the only family I had.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: No. He wasnt.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Why would you even know this.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: When we arrested you, we noticed an anomaly in your nervous system, so we had it checked out.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Im not Terran.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: You are half Terran. Your mother was of earth. Your father, well, hes something very ancient weve never seen here before.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: That could be why you were able to hold the stone for as long as you did.

Speaker: Nova Prime
Line: Your friends have arrived. On behalf of the Nova Corps, wed like to express our profound gratitude for your help in saving Xandar. If you will follow Denarian Dey, he has something to show you.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Thank you, Nova Prime.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Thank you.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Your wife and child shall rest well knowing that you have avenged them.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Yes. Of course, Ronan was only a puppet. Its really Thanos I need to kill.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: We tried to keep it as close to the original as possible. We salvaged as much as we could.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Wow. I… Thank you.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: I have a family who are alive because of you. Your criminal records have also been expunged. However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: Question. What if I see something that I want to take, and it belongs to someone else.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Well you will be arrested.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: But what if I want it more than the person who has it.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Still illegal.

Speaker: Rocket
Line: That doesnt follow. No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand. What are you laughing at. Why. I cant have a discussion with this gentleman.

Speaker: Drax
Line: What if someone does something irksome and I decide to remove his spine.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: Thats.thats actually murder. Its one of the worst crimes of all, so also illegal.

Speaker: Drax
Line: Hmm.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Theyll be fine, Dey. Im gonna keep an eye on em.

Speaker: Corpsman Dey
Line: You.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Yeah, me.

Speaker: Meredith Quill
Line: Peter, I know these last few months have been hard for you. But Im going to a better place and I will be okay. And I will always be with you. You are the light of my life. My precious son. My little Star-Lord. Love, mom.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: So, what should we do next. Something good. Something bad. A bit of both.

Speaker: Gamora
Line: Well follow your lead, Star-Lord.

Speaker: Peter Quill
Line: Bit of both.
